pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Age-Period-Cohort Modeling and Prediction // Bayesian Age-Period-Cohort Modeling and Prediction using efficient Markov Chain Monte Carlo Methods. This is the R version of the previous BAMP software as described in Volker Schmid and Leonhard Held (2007) DOI:10.18637/jss.v021.i08 Bayesian Age- Period-Cohort Modeling and Prediction - BAMP, Journal of Statistical Software 21:8. This package includes checks of convergence using Gelman's R.
